about_the_game:
Yugoslavia is moving towards the Soviet Union, only with much deeper problems, it seems, and the outcome will be much more bloody. But can the Party survive? Or will it be swept away by the centrifugal forces of decay? Will the country be saved by the new socialism or the old Marxism, or, at all, by a completely non-socialist movement? It all depends on you!

On this exciting trip on the steep Yugoslav rollercoasters, you will be able to:
- Play as 3 new countries, both part of Yugoslavia and having gained independence
- Try out new war mechanics with the ability to interact with opponents in different ways
- Start new researches and get new endings from them
- Reach 13 defeat endings
- Or get to the winning endings: 8 new special Yugoslav windows with multiple endings and 4 additional special endings
- Get the opportunity to save Yugoslavia both peacefully and militarily
- Take advantage of the new special situation window in Yugoslavia
- Or try to survive in the new Yugolsavian game mode!

Yugoslavia is moving towards the Soviet Union, only with much deeper problems, it seems, and the outcome will be much more bloody. But can the Party survive? Or will it be swept away by the centrifugal forces of decay? Will the country be saved by the new socialism or the old Marxism, or, at all, by a completely non-socialist movement? It all depends on you!

On this exciting trip on the steep Yugoslav rollercoasters, you will be able to:
- Play as 3 new countries, both part of Yugoslavia and having gained independence
- Try out new war mechanics with the ability to interact with opponents in different ways
- Start new researches and get new endings from them
- Reach 13 defeat endings
- Or get to the winning endings: 8 new special Yugoslav windows with multiple endings and 4 additional special endings
- Get the opportunity to save Yugoslavia both peacefully and militarily
- Take advantage of the new special situation window in Yugoslavia

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Ostalgie: Disorder in Yugoslavia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10, etc (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
